info.name: Mobile API
info.description:
Mobile API is used for communication between "mobile" application and Menu V3 API. Every request must introduce itself with "Application" header key. Some of requests also requires "Authorization" header key which represents Customer Account token. **Common Header Parameters** | Header Parameter | Example | Description | | ---------------- | ------------------------------------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | Accept | application/json | The Accept request HTTP header advertises which content types, expressed as MIME types, the client is able to understand. Currently only JSON is supported by Menu V3. | | Content-Type | application/json | The Content-Type entity header is used to indicate the media type of the resource. | | Accept-Language | en; fr-CH; | The Accept-Language request HTTP header advertises which languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred. | | AgentId | 912161aa-9a0d-11e8-9eb6-529269fb1459 | Unique device ID # Errors There is few common error types in the system and in case of error, API should return one of these error responses. #### 1. Validation Error This error is returned when some of the required fields are missing from request body. 
  {
      "status": "Unprocessable Entity",
      "code": 422,
      "data": {
          "validations": {
              "*attribute_name*": [
                  {
                      "rule": "Required",
                      "message": "The *attribute_name* field is required."
                  }
              ]
          }
      }
  }
#### 2. Menu Error 
{
   "status": "Error Status Message",
   "code": Error Status Code,
   "data": {
       "info_message": {
           "title": "Error Info Message Title",
           "body": "Error Info Message Body "
       }
   }
}
**"data"** object won't always exists - if it is empty it won't be returned in the error response at all. **"info_message"** - object inside "data" object should provide us more detailed information about the error. This object is not always provided so API consumer should check its existance before usage. **HTTP Standard Codes** | Status Code | Status Message | Description | | ----------- | ---------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 400 | Bad Request | This response means that server could not understand the request due to invalid syntax. | | 401 | Unauthorized | The client must authenticate itself to get the requested response. | | 403 | Forbidden | The user might not have the necessary permissions for a resource, or may need an account of some sort. | | 404 | Not Found | The requested resource could not be found but may be available in the future. | | 405 | Method Not Allowed | A request method is not supported for the requested resource; for example, a GET request on a form that requires data to be presented via POST, or a PUT request on a read-only resource | | 415 | Unsupported Media Type | The request entity has a media type which the server or resource does not support. | 426 | Upgrade Required | The Client must update its application to the newest one.| | 500 | Internal Server Error | A generic error message, given when an unexpected condition was encountered and no more specific message is suitable. **Menu Specific Codes** | Status Code | Status Message | Description | | ----------- | ------------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 0 | System Error | Something very bad happen. |

request.description:
Initial request for the application (first call by app). If country code is provided and the country exists in the system, returns the country object and list of available payment methods for that country. Otherwise, retruns all payment methods in supported by the system.

You can specife api version (Api-Version) in header, if version before 3.6.0 delivery order type will not be returned.
address_id is result of autocomplete address call

item.description:
A customer is required to register a Payment Method at signup, and has the possibility of adding more Payment Methods Architecture to his Customer Account later on. This does not apply to Guest Accounts, which cannot hold any Payment Methods Architecture.

Note: every Customer Account Payment Method has a Usage, though the customer does not necessarily get to choose which Usage applies to a Payment Method that he is creating, as this is defined by the respective Payment Method.

This means that for example, Swiss Lunch-Check always has the Usage "Business", whilst Credit cards can have both "Personal" and "Business", meaning the customer can choose.

## Stored Payment Methods Object

| Argument            | Type                            | Requirement                | Description                                                                                                                                     | Maximum Length |
| ------------------- | ------------------------------- | -------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------- |
| payment_method_id   | string                          | Required                   | id of the payment method                                                                                                                        | n/a            |
| is_default          | int                             | Default '0'  (not default) | Is stored payment method default ('1') or not ('0').                                                                                            | 1              |
| usage               | bool ('personal' or 'business') | Required                   | Defines if payment method is for personal or business use.                                                                                      | n/a            |
| payment_processors  | Object                          | Required                   | Object that defines payment processor: payment_method_id and payment method custom properties, like: masked number, cvv, expiration date etc.   | n/a            |

A Customer is defined by a unique e-mail address. A Customer cannot be created on its own, but is always automatically created in combination with a Customer Account. A Customer can have multiple Customer Accounts.

When a user registers for a Customer Account through an Application, and no Customer exists yet for the given e-mail address, a customer is created. Otherwise the Customer Account is attached to the existing Customer that exists for the e-mail.
When a user updates his e-mail for a Customer Account, and there is no existing Customer entry for the new e-mail, a customer is created. Otherwise the existing Customer is used.

item.description:
A Customer Account holds all customer-specific information including first name, last name etc., as well as payment methods. Orders are tied to a Customer Account (but don't have to be).

A Customer Account is created when a user registers within an Application. A Customer Account is always tied to a Brand, which corresponds to the Brand of the Application, where the user is registering.
A user can log into a Customer Account in each Application of the same Brand.

A Customer Account is always belongs to a Customer, determined by the e-mail address used when signing up. If a Customer with the corresponding e-mail address does not exist at signup, it is created. If the user changes the e-mail on his customer account, the Customer Account is assigned to the new respective Customer (and if it does not exist, it is created).

request.description:
Returns all venues by distance, by current users longitude lattitude, radius is optional parameter.

| Argument         | Type    | Requirement | Description                         | Maximum Length |
| ---------------- | ------- | ----------- | ----------------------------------- | -------------- |

| latitude             | Decimal  | Required    | Geographic latitude                        | 11,8            |
| longitude             | Decimal  | Required    | Geographic longitude                        | 11,8            |
| radius             | Integer  | Optional    | Search radius in meters                        | NA            |

request.description:
Returns all venue that deliver to selected address.

Either address_id or address coordinates (latitude, longitude) are required fields. address_id is result of autocomplete address call, coordinates are used if u already got them from existing customer addresses or from customer device geo location.

Venue_id is optional field in case you want to check is particular venue is delivering to selected address.

request.description:
Create an Order

| Attribute                           | Type     | Requirement              | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| ----------------------------------- | -------- | ------------------------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| singular_point_id                   | int      | Required                 | The ID of Singular point used as order create output. For Dine-in and Payment-only it should be a Singular point with Table output, while for Pick & Pay, Preorder, Quick service and Take-out it's a singular point with Area as output.                                                                                                            |
| stored_payment_method_id            | int      | Optional                 | The ID of one of the Customer account's stored payment methods. If omitted, the preselected Stored payment method will be used.                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| order_type                          | object   | Required                 | Container for order type specific parameters.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| order_type.id                       | int      | Required                 | The type ID of Order type. Valid type_id values: 1 = Dine-in, 2 = Payment-only, 3 = Pick & Pay, 4 = Preorder, 5 = Quick service, 6 = Take-out.                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| order_type.customer_phone_number    | string   | Required (conditionally) | Customer account contact phone number. Specific and required to Preorder and Take-out order types.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| order_type.pickup_asap              | boolean  | Optional                 | Used when creating a Take-out order from inside the Venue. If true, regular pickup time selection is ignored and order is sent to POS immediately. Specific only to Take-out order type.                                                                                                                                                             |
| order_type.pickup_at                | datetime | Optional                 | The order pickup time selected out of the available pickup times. Valid pickup time format is: yyyy-mm-dd hh:ii:ss (e.g. 2018-09-29 18:015:00) and should represent the UTC timezone. Specific for Preorder and Take-out order types. Required for Preorders and also for Take-out orders in case "pickup_asap" attribute is missing or is false. Ignored for Take-out orders when "pickup_asap" attribute is set to true. |
| tip                                 | object   | Optional                 | Container for tip related parameters. Specific to Dine-in and Payment-only order types.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| tip.amount                          | int      | Required                 | Tip amount in cents.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| menu_items                          | array    | Required (conditionally) | List of Menu items added to order cart. Specific and required to all order types except Payment-only.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| menu_items.price_level_id           | int      | Required                 | The ID of price level  of the selected Menu item.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| menu_items.quantity                 | int      | Required                 | Quantity of the selected Menu item in order cart.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| menu_items.modifiers                | array    | Optional                 | List of modifier IDs applied to selected Menu item.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| menu_items.comment                  | string   | Optional                 | An ordering related comment/note for the selected Menu item.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| pos_items                           | array    | Required (conditionally) | List of Unpaid POS items selected for payment. Specific and required exclusively to Payment-only order type.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| pos_items.id                        | string   | Required                 | The ID of the imported Unpaid POS item.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| payment_info                        | object   | Required (conditionally) | Container for payment specific parameters. Required for Kiosk and Web applications, ignored otherwise. The object structure is application specific.                                                                                                                                                                                                 |

| singular_point_id                   | int      | Required                 | The ID of Singular point used as order create output. For Dine-in and Payment-only it should be a Singular point with Table output, while for Pick & Pay, Preorder, Quick service and Take-out it's a singular point with Area as output.                                                                                                            |
| stored_payment_method_id            | int      | Optional                 | The ID of one of the Customer account's stored payment methods. If omitted, the preselected Stored payment method will be used.                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| order_type                          | object   | Required                 | Container for order type specific parameters.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| order_type.id                       | int      | Required                 | The type ID of Order type. Valid type_id values: 1 = Dine-in, 2 = Payment-only, 3 = Pick & Pay, 4 = Preorder, 5 = Quick service, 6 = Take-out.                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| order_type.customer_phone_number    | string   | Required (conditionally) | Customer account contact phone number. Specific and required to Preorder and Take-out order types.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| order_type.pickup_asap              | boolean  | Optional                 | Used when creating a Take-out order from inside the Venue. If true, regular pickup time selection is ignored and order is sent to POS immediately. Specific only to Take-out order type.                                                                                                                                                             |
| order_type.pickup_at                | datetime | Optional                 | The order pickup time selected out of the available pickup times. Valid pickup time format is: yyyy-mm-dd hh:ii:ss (e.g. 2018-09-29 18:015:00) and should represent the UTC timezone. Specific for Preorder and Take-out order types. Required for Preorders and also for Take-out orders in case "pickup_asap" attribute is missing or is false. Ignored for Take-out orders when "pickup_asap" attribute is set to true. |
| tip                                 | object   | Optional                 | Container for tip related parameters. Specific to Dine-in and Payment-only order types.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| tip.amount                          | int      | Required                 | Tip amount in cents.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| menu_items                          | array    | Required (conditionally) | List of Menu items added to order cart. Specific and required to all order types except Payment-only.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| menu_items.price_level_id           | int      | Required                 | The ID of price level  of the selected Menu item.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| menu_items.quantity                 | int      | Required                 | Quantity of the selected Menu item in order cart.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| menu_items.modifiers                | array    | Optional                 | List of modifier IDs applied to selected Menu item.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| menu_items.comment                  | string   | Optional                 | An ordering related comment/note for the selected Menu item.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| pos_items                           | array    | Required (conditionally) | List of Unpaid POS items selected for payment. Specific and required exclusively to Payment-only order type.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| pos_items.id                        | string   | Required                 | The ID of the imported Unpaid POS item.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| payment_info                        | object   | Required (conditionally) | Container for payment specific parameters. Required for Kiosk and Web applications, ignored otherwise. request.description:
Returns all venues by distance, by current users longitude lattitude, radius is optional parameter.

Also will save anonymous Geo Log with customer device uuid. Same device uuid will be logged at the most after 30 mintues.

| Argument         | Type    | Requirement | Description                         | Maximum Length |
| ---------------- | ------- | ----------- | ----------------------------------- | -------------- |
| device_uuid             | String  | Required    | Unique device id                        | 255            |
| latitude             | Decimal  | Required    | Geographic latitude                        | 11,8            |
| longitude             | Decimal  | Required    | Geographic longitude                        | 11,8            |
| radius             | Integer  | Optional    | Search radius in meters                        | NA            |
